description: '''Candice Night''' (born May 8, 1971) is an American singer and musician. She has been the vocalist/lyricist and multi-instrumentalist for the traditional [[folk rock]] project [[Blackmore's Night]] since its origins in 1997 with her husband, guitarist [[Ritchie Blackmore]]. She is also the backing vocalist for [[Rainbow (rock band)|Rainbow]] from 1994 to 1997 and 2015â€“present, again with Blackmore. Her first solo album, ''[[Reflections (Candice Night album)|Reflections]]'', was released in 2011.
